title: Breakingviews TV: Redstone blues
text:
Breakingviews TV: Redstone blues 1:25pm EDT - 04:19 
Jennifer Saba and Richard Beales break down the latest potential reunification of CBS and Viacom, the two Redstone family-controlled media companies, in which CBS may be considering a below-market offer. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Jennifer Saba and Richard Beales break down the latest potential reunification of CBS and Viacom, the two Redstone family-controlled media companies, in which CBS may be considering a below-market offer.
